SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(START_DT + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATES -- 날짜 ,TO_CHAR (START_DT + LEVEL - 1, 'D') DAYS -- 요일 FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') START_DT -- 이번달 시작 년월일 ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 'DD')) END_DT -- 마지막 날짜 FROM DUAL ) A
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= A.END_DT ) TM -- 마지막 날짜까지 반복
WHERE TM.DAYS NOT IN ('1', '7') -- 일요일,토요일 제외 ORDER BY TM.DATES ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND TO_CHAR(ATTE_DATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT OVER.ATTE_NO , OVER.OVER_START , OVER.OVER_END , OVER.OVER_CONT , ATTEN.EMP_CD , ATTEN.ATTE_STIME , ATTEN.ATTE_END , ATTEN.ATTE_DATE FROM OVERTIME OVER INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE ATTEN ON(OVER.ATTE_NO = ATTEN.ATTE_NO) WHERE ATTEN.EMP_CD=#{empCd} AND TO_CHAR(OVER_START,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY OVER_START DESC )B

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT TRIP_NO , EMP_CD , TRIP_DATE , TRIP_PURPOSE , TRIP_PLACE , TRIP_SDATE , TRIP_EDATE , DOC_NO FROM TRIP WHERE EMP_CD =#{empCd} AND TRIP_DATE>=SYSDATE ORDER BY TRIP_DATE )B

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,B.* FROM( SELECT VOCATION_CODE , EMP_CD , VOCATION_NO , VOCATION_SDAY , VOCATION_EDAY , VOCATION_ADDDATE FROM VOCATION WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND VOCATION_SDAY>=SYSDATE ORDER BY VOCATION_SDAY ASC )B

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT SAL_NO , EMP_CD , SUM(SAL_TOTAL) SAL_TOTAL FROM SALARY_DETAIL WHERE EMP_CD=#{empCd} GROUP BY EMP_CD, SAL_NO ORDER BY SAL_NO DESC)B )A
where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT SAL_NO , EMP_CD , SUM(ALLOW_AMT) ALLOW_AMT FROM ALLOW_HISTORY WHERE EMP_CD=#{empCd} GROUP BY EMP_CD, SAL_NO ORDER BY SAL_NO DESC)B )A
where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT SAL_NO , EMP_CD , SUM(DDC_AMT) DDC_AMT FROM DDC_HISTORY WHERE EMP_CD=#{empCd} GROUP BY EMP_CD, SAL_NO ORDER BY SAL_NO DESC)B )A
where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT TA.TRAIN_NO , TA.EMP_CD , TA.TA_DATE , TA.CODE , T.TRAIN_PLACE , T.TRAIN_TIME , T.TRAIN_TARGET , T.TRAIN_NAME , T.TRAIN_CONTENT , T.TRAIN_DATE -- 교육일자 , L.LECTOR_NAME FROM TRALINING_APPLICATION TA INNER JOIN TRAINING T ON(TA.TRAIN_NO = T.TRAIN_NO) INNER JOIN LECTOR L ON(T.LECTOR_ID = L.LECTOR_ID) WHERE EMP_CD=#{empCd} AND TRAIN_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY TRAIN_DATE ASC )B

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT DOC_NO , EMP_CD , SIGNPATH_NO , DT_NO , DOC_TITLE , DOC_CONTENT , DOC_TYPE , DOC_UPDATEDATE , DOC_SIGN , CODE , ATCH_NO FROM DOCUMENT WHERE EMP_CD=#{empCd} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(DOC_NO) DESC )B )A
where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
